title: My Weekend
description: Adam talks about his weekend activities.
speaker: Adam
text: Today, I want to talk about my weekend.
On Friday, I finish work in the afternoon.
On Saturday, I wake up late.
I have breakfast with my family.
In the afternoon, I go out with my friends.
We drink coffee and talk together.
On Sunday, I stay at home.
In the evening, I prepare for the new week.
I enjoy my weekend very much.
